Empowch February 2025: Building Bridges, Breaking Barriers
February 8, 2025
A Successful Trip to the 1871 Fintech Innovation Summit in Chicago ‚úàÔ∏è Kicking off the year with a bang, our team attended the 1871 Fintech Innovation Summit in Chicago this January! This event was an incredible opportunity to engage with top fintech leaders, investors, and pioneers who are shaping the future of digital finance.
Our participation at 1871 gave us deeper insights into fintech trends, investment strategies, and emerging technologies, inspiring our next moves in developing Shaheen and our Interoperable API. Engaging in conversations with industry leaders reinforced the urgency of solving the interoperability challenge in digital payments, positioning Empowch as a key player in this revolution.
This experience provided a wealth of inspiration as we continue refining our technology and preparing for the next stages of growth. Stay tuned for insights and takeaways from the summit in the coming weeks!
  Accepted into QUBIC Labs: A Game-Changing Milestone üèÜ We are thrilled to announce our acceptance into QUBIC Labs (Feb-May 2025)! This is a huge milestone for Empowch, providing us with the perfect environment to accelerate the development of our Interoperable API.
  Why QUBIC Labs Matters QUBIC Labs is a fintech-focused startup accelerator with a track record of supporting groundbreaking innovations. Some of their past alumni have made significant strides in the blockchain and payments industry, including startups we met during the 1871 Fintech Innovation Summit.
Our participation in QUBIC Labs means:  ‚úÖ Expert Mentorship: Direct access to seasoned fintech leaders from Coinbase, Cardano, Coinmetrics, Grant Thornton, MoonPay, Robinhood, Solana, and top institutions like MIT, Harvard, and Suffolk University. ‚úÖ A Comprehensive 12-Week Hybrid Program: The program kicks off on February 18, 2025, with 10 weeks of remote learning followed by an immersive 2-week in-person segment in the Greater Boston area. ‚úÖ Exclusive Coaching & Contests: Engage in bi-weekly pitch contests, receive investor feedback, and participate in collaborative opportunities with Nvidia, Hacken, Kadena, and Algorand. ‚úÖ Demo Day in Boston: At the end of the program, we will present Empowch and the Interoperable API to a curated audience of investors, angels, and industry leaders.
This is an unparalleled opportunity to refine our business model, strengthen our investor outreach, and position Empowch as a leading force in Web3 fintech.
We‚Äôll be dedicating a lot of content to this over the next few weeks, highlighting what QUBIC Labs does and how it will shape Empowch‚Äôs journey. Stay tuned!
  Full Steam Ahead: The Interoperable API üöÄ The development of our Interoperable API is progressing rapidly. This is the missing link in global blockchain payments‚Äîa SWIFT-style system for digital wallets that will enable seamless transactions between different payment rails, whether they are blockchain-based, bank-connected, or cash-powered.
Our goal? To make sending digital assets as easy as sending a text message‚Äîregardless of the underlying technology. We are leveraging blockchain, smart contracts, stablecoins, and LLM technology to create the most frictionless, secure, and scalable payment infrastructure in the market.
And there‚Äôs more: We are building our first cross-platform bridge between two major blockchains! This will serve as the foundation for our pilot project, allowing two wallets from different blockchains to communicate and transact seamlessly.
A key part of our experience with QUBIC Labs will be building and refining this API with guidance from some of the industry‚Äôs greatest Web3 minds. Through expert mentorship, hands-on development, and structured learning, we will enhance the API‚Äôs capabilities, ensuring it meets the needs of digital wallet providers and users alike. This program is an essential milestone in bringing our vision of seamless blockchain interoperability to life.
  A Huge Success: Our First Angel Investor Briefing üéâ Last week, we hosted our first Angel Investor Briefing, and the response was incredible! Over 20 potential private and institutional angel investors joined us for an engaging session where we shared our vision, progress, and the game-changing role of our self-custody blockchain wallet Shaheen in the digital payments space. The questions asked were insightful, challenging us to refine our approach even further.
Given the success and the enthusiasm from our attendees, we are excited to announce that our second session will take place at the end of February. If you‚Äôre interested in joining this exclusive discussion, send us a DM‚Äîwe‚Äôd love to have you in the room as we shape the future of financial technology.
  Web Summit Doha 2025: Bringing Shaheen to MENA üåç Big news! Shaheen will be exhibiting at Web Summit Doha from February 26-29, 2025, at a stand provided by Flat6Labs – StartMashreq Program! Learn more about the event here
Web Summit Doha is one of the world‚Äôs largest and most influential tech conferences, attracting over 1,500 startups, investors, entrepreneurs, and industry leaders from across the globe. The event serves as a premier platform for networking, showcasing innovations, and forging high-impact partnerships.
With its strong focus on fintech, blockchain, and emerging technologies, Web Summit Doha presents a significant opportunity for Shaheen to connect with investors, partners, and potential users. As we prepare for this major event, we‚Äôre also working on solutions for financial inclusion in Lebanon and Syria‚Äîtwo regions where access to stable financial services is critically needed.
This is also our first time visiting Doha, Qatar, a rising fintech hub, and we‚Äôre excited to connect with industry leaders, investors, and partners. If you‚Äôll be at Web Summit Doha, drop by our booth!
  The Road Ahead: What‚Äôs Next? With so much happening, 2025 is already shaping up to be a transformational year for Empowch and Shaheen. Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs coming up next:  ‚úÖ 2nd Angel Investor Briefing at the end of February‚ÄîDM us if you want to join! ‚úÖ Web Summit Doha‚Äîexhibiting Shaheen to the MENA region at the Flat6Labs – StartMashreq stand. ‚úÖ QUBIC Labs acceleration program‚Äîfine-tuning our Interoperable API. ‚úÖ First blockchain-to-blockchain bridge‚Äîbringing cross-platform transactions to life. ‚úÖ Mshreq UAE collaboration‚Äîamplifying Shaheen‚Äôs impact in the Levant.
We are building the future of global finance, and we invite you to be part of it. Whether you‚Äôre an investor, a fintech partner, or a community member excited about the potential of blockchain, we‚Äôd love to connect.
Let‚Äôs make finance truly borderless. üöÄ

Empowering the Levant: How Empowch Aligns with New US Policies to Drive Financial Inclusion
January 25, 2025
A New Way Forward: How Shaheen Transforms Lives For millions of families across the Levant, receiving remittances is a vital lifeline for them and the country. Yet, the traditional systems they rely on are fraught with inefficiencies, corruption and profiteering. High fees, slow transaction speeds, and logistical hurdles make accessing funds a costly and time-consuming ordeal. Shaheen, powered by Empowch‚Äôs innovative platform, is changing this reality. ¬† Breaking Barriers with Shaheen Imagine a family in Northern Lebanon. In the past, receiving a remittance often meant traveling to the nearest city‚Äîa journey that could take an entire day. Once there, they‚Äôd face long queues, costly fees, and the risks associated with carrying large amounts of cash back home. For many, this wasn‚Äôt just an inconvenience; it was a significant safety concern and a drain on limited resources. Now, with Shaheen, this scenario looks entirely different: Instant Transfers, Minimal Costs: A worker in Europe can send funds directly to their family‚Äôs Shaheen wallet in seconds. The transaction is seamless, transparent, and costs between 1%-2% of the transfer amount‚Äîa fraction of what traditional remittance services charge. Stable Value Through Stablecoins: Recipients receive funds in USDC or EURC, stablecoins pegged 1:1 to the U.S. dollar or Euro. This ensures that their money retains its value, even in regions affected by currency instability. Convenient Local Access: Instead of traveling to a faraway bank or remittance office, recipients can visit their nearest cash CONNECTOR‚Ñ¢, a trusted local partner in the Empowch network. At the CONNECTOR‚Ñ¢, they can exchange their stablecoins for local currency, quickly and safely. This innovative system saves families time, reduces travel costs, and eliminates the risks associated with carrying cash over long distances. For recipients, Shaheen is not just a wallet; it‚Äôs a bridge to financial security and empowerment and helps communities thrive. ¬† A Vision for Financial Inclusion in the Levant The Levant‚Äîspanning countries like Lebanon, Syria, and Jordan‚Äîhas faced decades of conflict, economic turmoil, and inadequate banking infrastructure. These challenges have left millions underserved, excluded from the global financial system. Empowch sees this as an opportunity to make a real difference. ¬† Why Empowch Leads the Way Empowch vs. Shaheen: Empowch is the company driving financial inclusion through innovation, while Shaheen is the product delivering on this promise. The Shaheen wallet empowers users with secure, self-custody blockchain accounts, enabling instant, low-cost cross-border transactions and savings in digital dollars. Stablecoins for Stability: The executive order‚Äôs focus on stablecoins underscores their importance as tools for financial stability. By offering USDC and other stablecoins, Shaheen ensures users are protected from currency devaluation and market volatility. Self-Custody for Empowerment: Shaheen‚Äôs self-custody approach gives individuals full control over their funds, reducing dependence on intermediaries. This aligns with the executive order‚Äôs emphasis on protecting individual financial freedoms. Interoperable Solutions: Empowch‚Äôs proprietary interoperable API bridges fragmented payment systems across cash, banking, and blockchain rails. This technology unlocks new opportunities for regions like the Levant, enabling seamless financial transactions where traditional systems fail. Catalyst for Economic Rebuilding: The Levant‚Äôs path to recovery depends on efficient, inclusive financial systems. Empowch and Shaheen provide the tools needed to support trade, remittances, and entrepreneurship, laying the groundwork for sustainable growth. ¬† Building a Better Future The new executive order highlights the immense potential of digital financial technology to transform lives. For Empowch, this is a call to action. By leveraging blockchain innovation, stablecoins, and self-custody solutions, we are breaking down barriers and creating opportunities for millions in the Levant and beyond. The transformative power of Shaheen lies in its ability to turn challenges into opportunities. For families who once spent hours traveling to cash remittances, Shaheen delivers convenience, security, and financial stability. For the Levant, Empowch represents hope, resilience, and a brighter future. ¬† Join the Movement Together, we can turn financial exclusion into empowerment. Empowch is not just building financial tools‚Äîwe‚Äôre building a world where access to financial services is a right, not a privilege. Let‚Äôs create that future, one transaction at a time.

Reflecting on 2024: Building Bridges, Empowering Communities
January 13, 2025
When financial systems collapse in the wake of war or political instability, rebuilding them is both an urgent and daunting challenge. Governments face broken infrastructure, displaced populations, and economic isolation. In such situations, innovation is no longer optional‚Äîit is a political necessity. Speaking at a recent conference in Riyadh on the subject of Syria, the German Foreign Minister, Annalena Baerbock remarked: ‚ÄúWe must innovate not just for growth but for resilience. The solutions we adopt today will determine the stability of nations tomorrow.‚Äù This sentiment captures the essence of why blockchain technology is increasingly seen as a transformative tool in rebuilding financial services systems.¬† At Empowch, we have piloted, tested, and refined blockchain solutions that can be deployed rapidly to provide financial infrastructure where it is most needed. These systems enable cross-border aid transfers to reach recipients directly, bypassing corrupt intermediaries and middle men with a self custody blockchain wallet providing every person with an instant blockchain account to store and transact with digital currencies like Circle USDC and EURC , safely and securely on the Stellar Development Foundations Stellar Blockchain which has already had field testing in Ukraine.
Lessons from Riyadh: A Call for Resilient Financial Solutions The Riyadh conference brought together policymakers, technologists, and development leaders to discuss innovative ways to address global financial instability. Key discussions highlighted: The Need for Financial Inclusion: With billions excluded from formal financial systems, there was a consensus on the importance of scalable solutions to bridge the gap for underserved populations. The Role of Technology in Crisis Recovery: Blockchain, in particular, was lauded for its potential to offer transparent, secure, and accessible financial tools for both governments and citizens. Collaboration Across Borders: The conference emphasized the importance of partnerships between public and private sectors to implement effective solutions. Building on these themes, blockchain technology stands out as a holistic framework for rebuilding financial systems in transitioning economies like Syria or Ukraine.
Blockchain as a Catalyst for Stability and Inclusion Blockchain‚Äôs value lies not just in its innovation but in its adaptability to crisis scenarios. Here‚Äôs how it addresses the challenges of financial recovery: 1. Direct Aid Distribution One of the most pressing challenges discussed in Riyadh was the inefficiency of aid delivery systems. Blockchain provides a transparent ledger, ensuring that funds are traceable from donor to recipient. For example, a system like the Shaheen wallet can facilitate direct deposits into self-custody wallets, eliminating the need for intermediaries and ensuring aid reaches those who need it most. 2. Inclusive Financial Access In fragile economies, traditional banking infrastructure is often inaccessible or non-existent. Blockchain wallets offer an immediate, scalable solution. By empowering individuals with self-custody wallets, even the unbanked can store, send, and receive funds securely. 3. Resilient Economic Integration A significant point raised in Riyadh was the challenge of integrating informal cash economies into the global financial system. Stablecoins like USDC or EURC can bridge this gap, providing a stable store of value and enabling seamless cross-border transactions. This approach not only stabilizes local economies but also connects them to global markets.
Insights into Implementation: A Tested Solution At Empowch, we have piloted blockchain solutions designed to be plug-and-play, allowing for rapid deployment. These systems provide: Interoperability: A unified framework that connects blockchain systems to cash and banking rails. Transparency: Immutable ledgers that ensure every transaction is accounted for. Scalability: Tools that can serve populations ranging from a few thousand to millions, enabling governments to rebuild trust and functionality quickly.
The Road Ahead: Transforming Words Into Action The Riyadh conference made it clear that innovation alone is not enough. Implementation requires: Regulatory Alignment: Blockchain systems must operate within international legal frameworks. Public-Private Partnerships: Governments, NGOs, and private companies must collaborate to ensure solutions are both effective and sustainable. Education and Capacity Building: Local communities need support to adopt and utilize blockchain technologies effectively. As the German Foreign Minister noted, resilience is the cornerstone of future stability. Blockchain offers a pathway to achieving this resilience, providing nations with the tools they need to rebuild equitably and transparently.
Conclusion: A Shared Responsibility Rebuilding financial systems in the wake of collapse is a global responsibility. Blockchain technology offers a transformative solution, empowering governments to bypass inefficiencies, deliver aid effectively, and restore trust in financial systems. At Empowch, we are ready to lead this effort, working with global partners to bring our tested solutions to nations in need. To policymakers, technologists, and leaders: The future of financial stability is in your hands. Together, we can make the vision of resilience a reality. ¬†
